title: Memories of a radio
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Radio programs - Australia - History
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Radio - History
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Dreams
abstract: Like my memories and dreams, my radio still keeps me company.
description: Gordon Preston talks about his life, his love of the radio and the comfort it brings him. He shares key experiences from his life, like when he first arrived in Melbourne by ship and his vivid dreams and how his radio has followed him everywhere, sometimes illuminating the life he is missing out on, sometimes illuminating his memories and dreams.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001791; Beyond the Big Issue : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2009
